alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:56AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Bay and southeastern Walton Counties through 530 AM EDT/430 AM CDT/... At 455 AM EDT/355 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Santa Rosa Beach, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Bruce, Bunker, Seminole Hills and Port Washington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; South Walton
